body:
Comment 2: 
See [0]: "The receiver type must be of the form T or *T where T is a type name. The type
denoted by T is called the receiver base type; it must not be a pointer or interface
type and it must be declared in the same package as the method."

Note the "it must not be" part.

#WorkingAsIntended

  [0]: http://golang.org/ref/spec#Method_declarations
